hilgame.htext2: Catch 5 acorns and throw them into Scrats basket.
hilgame.htext4: You control Eddie (and Crash) rolling on a wooden tube.
hilgame.htext5: Eddie accelerates towards your mouse cursor.
hilgame.htext6: To pick up Crash or acorns from floor, roll over them.
hilgame.htext8: if Crash has acorn: Throw acorn.
hilgame.htext9: You have to hit basket from top, otherwise acorn will bounce back.
hilgame.htext10: if Crash has no acorn: Crash jumps to catch acorn.
hilgame.htext11: You receive points for each acorn.
hilgame.htext12: The more Scrat has to work, the less points you get.
hilgame.htext13: Additionally theres a time bonus for being fast
hilgame.pressmouse: PRESS LEFT MOUSE BUTTON TO start
